Posts.Content: I had radiotherapy 3 years ago. In my 30’s, 40”s and 50’s I would get good results with Aphrodisiacs (Ginseng and some other herbs combos). Now Cialis works and the herbs don’t seem to do much any more. Has anyone tried the Priapus Shot (AKA P-shot) or any OTC products (herbs, gels, etc)? What works? Does Kegel exercises work for someone that has had radiotherapy?
Posts.Title: Aphrodisiacs, Priapus Shot. What works?

Posts.Content: You can get safe, inexpensive quality generic and brand name drugs from Canada. Just get a prescription from your doctor and make sure the pharmacy is CIPA licensed. Generic and sometimes bran name Cialis, Viagra for about $0.50 to $3 a pill and other drugs too. Go to www.cipa.com/certified-safe-online-pharmacies/ for a list of trusted CIPA Canadian pharmacies. Stop getting ripped off by American drug companies.

Posts.Content: I had SBRT 2.5 years ago, Gleason 4+3. I was told my chances of cancer returning was 15%. I was not worried until I read this study: Predicting Biochemical Disease-Free survival after Prostate stereotactic Body radiotherapy: risk-stratification and Patterns of Failure. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4937020/ http://journal.frontiersin.org/artic...016.00168/full Any opinions?
Posts.Title: SBRT, Gleason 4+3, unfavorable. Concerned!

Posts.Content: My Gleason 4+3, psa 5, T1c. Age 63 My parient table calculation was 52% organ confined. Is this a 48% chance of treatment failure? I’m confused, what is the point in getting treatment? Thanks JJ My history: Gleason 4+3, psa 4.7, T1c. Age 63, SBRT July 2014. PSA4.7 6-13, SBRT 7-14, PSA3.4 10-14, PSA2 5-15, PSA3 9-15 (bounce), PSA2 11-15, PS1.3 4-16, PSA1.1 9-16, PSA1.0 12-16. JJ888

Posts.Content: Radiotherapy 3 years ago. Cialis sometimes does not work. Most of the time it works great. I take it once a week, 10 MG one hour before on an empty stomach. Is it loosing its effectiveness? Do I need to rotate it with Viagra? Do Kegel exercises work for someone that had radiation (I was told no)? Will anything enhance the Cialis? Im paying $300 for 30 5mg tabs. How can I get it for less money? Any other herbs, etc work? My history: Gleason 4+3, PSA 4.7, T1c, Age 63, SBRT July 2014. PSA4.7 6-13, SBRT 7-14, PSA3.4 10-14, PSA2 5-15, PSA3 9-15 (bounce), PSA2 11-15, PSA1.3 4-16, PSA1.1 9-16, PSA1.0 12-16. JJ888

Posts.Content: I need some help! I had radiotherapy 3 years ago. I take Cialis 10MG once a week. When I first started taking it about 2 years ago it worked very good in about 30 minutes. Now I takes 24 hours to work and often it does not work very good. Do you have any ideas or recommendations? Cialis. Sometimes it works good and sometimes not so good. When I first started taking it, it would work in 30 minutes. Now it takes 24 hours. I use 10mg once a week. Any information opinions or cause? Any opinion on the Priapus Shot (P-shot). Is it of any value after radiotherapy VED 3x week? Any other recommendations for ED?
Posts.Title: Cialis help and advice

Posts.Content: I had SBRT Truebeam, same treatment using different equipment. Go to [LINK DELETED BY MODERATOR] to read about experience. NOTE: Forum rules prohibit the posting of competitor sites. However, it is fine to send the link to someone via private message. Thanks, Chuck
Posts.Title: CyberKnife

Posts.Content: Im not a moderator. If you get treated with Cyberknife make sure they exclude your testicles from the treatment field. Total testicular dose should be well under 1Gy. Sometimes in planning they get lazy. Ask to see the dose constraints to insure you are not being over treated.
Posts.Title: CyberKnife

Posts.Content: Im 66. I did try a VED and ring, it did not work well
Posts.Title: Sex 3 to 5 years after radiotherapy.

Posts.Content: Sex 3 to 5 years after radiotherapy. Any advice? Is anyone having any success? Cialis worked for a year or 2, now it only works sometimes. Any herbs, other supplements? My doctors are of no use. Do men just give up? What do you do? Am I history?
